comments.body: Ah yes the AIDS degree. If only they gave it a second thought.
If you want to know why people are opting for PES - its primarily because of the branch. PES offers a CS specialisation while the others are specialised degrees.
pesu subreddit is becoming WHICH-COLLEGE-tards (on the path of btechtards)
So in pes we'll be getting b tech in cs with specialization in AiML right???

PES offers a BTech in CS-AIML. This is a CS specialisation or CS-allied branch. 

The others offer BTech in AIML/DS/etc. This is a specialised branch itself.
Ok. Among core cs in colleges like uvce and cs-aiml in pes which one do you think is better??
I don't know enough about UVCE. If you want to compare just the branches, check the FAQs pinned on this subreddit.
